DC CODE § 7-2047

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Prosecutions of violations of this subchapter shall be brought by the Corporation Counsel in the name of the District of Columbia.

In prosecutions initiated pursuant to this subchapter, a child development facility claiming an exemption from a licensing requirement of this subchapter shall have the burden of proving entitlement to the exemption.

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Child Care Services and Facilities. (Refs & Annos)
